title: Printing Function
description: Write a function named `printAge` that takes an integer `age` as a parameter and prints it. Then call this function from `main()` with a user-provided value.
instructions:
1. Define a function `printAge(age: Int)`.
2. Inside the function, print the age using `println()`.
3. In `main()`, read an integer from the user using `readln().toInt()` and call `printAge`.

hints.text: Call the function like this: printAge(number)
